mapper.select: SELECT CUST_NO AS "custNo", NAME AS "name", AGE AS "age", DISEASE_CODE AS "code", RESULT_MSG AS "result" FROM CUSTOMER_INSURANCE ORDER BY CUST_NO ASC
mapper.update: MERGE INTO CUSTOMER_INSURANCE T USING DUAL ON (T.CUST_NO = #{custNo}) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET T.NAME = #{name}, T.AGE = #{age}, T.DISEASE_CODE = #{code}, T.RESULT_MSG = #{result} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT(CUST_NO, NAME, AGE, DISEASE_CODE, RESULT_MSG) VALUES (#{custNo}, #{name}, #{age}, #{code}, #{result})
